items.title: Jordi Cruijff wordt nieuwe technisch directeur bij Ajax
Lang de dupe van 'paradoxaal transferverbod' voor Napoli? 'We sluiten niets uit'
items.summary: Napoli-directeur Giovanni Manna is niet te spreken over het transferverbod dat Napoli is opgelegd voor de komende winterwindow. De Serie A-kampioen heeft niet voldaan aan de criteria die verbonden zijn aan de uitgebreide verhouding tussen arbeidskosten en inkomsten. Dit betekent dat Napoli eerst moet verkopen, voordat er nieuwe spelers mogen worden aangetrokken.

items.title: VI Live: aanvoerder De Roon ontvangt Internazionale
items.summary: Goedendag en welkom in de VI Live van zondag 28 december! De laatste zondag van 2025 zit vol met leuke wedstrijden, en in dit liveblog hoeft u niks te missen.

items.title: C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire v Cameroon: Afcon 2025 ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from the heavyweight Afcon clash in Group F ‚öΩ Scores | Group Tables | Follow us on Bluesky | Mail Billy Hello and welcome. We‚Äôre a week into the Africa Cup of Nations now and really getting down to business. Tonight, two of the continent‚Äôs heavyweights meet in Marrakech as the reigning champions, C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire, take on Cameroon in Group F. Both teams won their opening match 1-0 on Christmas Eve and, realistically, this is a showdown for top spot in the group ‚Äì though Mozambique will have something to say after beating Gabon earlier today. Don‚Äôt ask me about permutations but, with the four best third-placed teams also heading to the last 16, a draw tonight will all but guarantee both teams‚Äô progression to the knockouts. items.title: Pulisic nets in Milan win, on pace for best campaign
items.summary: Christian Pulisic is on pace for the best season of his career -- in a season that will conclude with a home World Cup played in the United States.

items.title: Van Dijk: More to come from Wirtz for Liverpool
items.summary: Virgil van Dijk has heaped praise on teammate Florian Wirtz and backed him to continue delivering for Liverpool after he scored his first goal for the club in Saturday's 2-1 victory over Wolverhampton Wanderers.

items.title: Spurs ease pressure on Frank with win at Palace
items.summary: Archie Gray's first goal for Tottenham ensured they ended a rollercoaster 2025 with a 1-0 win at Crystal Palace to ease the pressure on Thomas Frank.

items.title: √òdegaard: Rice has put Arsenal in charge again
items.summary: Martin Odegaard believes Declan Rice's "unbelievable" performance as an emergency right-back demonstrates that Arsenal are "ready to do whatever it takes" to win the Premier League.

items.title: Archie Gray heads Spurs to victory at Crystal Palace to ease pressure on Frank
items.summary: Eighteen months can be a very long time in football ‚Äì especially if you are still a teenager. After a mixed start to life in north London, Archie Gray could not have picked a better occasion to score his first Tottenham goal since joining from Leeds in the summer of 2024 than his 60th appearance. With Thomas Frank already showing signs of not being the first Spurs manager to have been overwhelmed by expectations after a run of just one win in their previous eight Premier League matches, Gray‚Äôs scrappy header in the first half ensured that a topsy-turvy year ended with a victory that lifts his side to within one point of Crystal Palace in the table. Of the 20 goals that Oliver Glasner‚Äôs side have conceded this season in the league, 12 have come from set-pieces and Palace have now failed to win any of their last five matches as a packed schedule has finally caught up with them. But this was all about Gray as the 19-year-old midfielder who left the pitch to a standing ovation and big hug from Frank after becoming the youngest Englishman to score for Tottenham in the Premier League since a certain Dele Alli in January 2016. Continue reading...

items.title: Aanvoerder Van de Ven met Spurs naar belangrijke zege op stadsgenoot
Bundesliga-topscorer Ailton koopt na 21 jaar zijn topscorerstrofee terug
items.summary: Kent u Ailton nog? Met 28 goals had de Braziliaan in het seizoen 2003/04 een enorm aandeel in de laatste landstitel van Werder Bremen, maar zijn topscorerstrofee was 21 jaar in andere handen. Nu heeft Ailton het beeld teruggekocht.

items.title: Kyrgios beats Sabalenka in 'Battle of the Sexes' showdown
items.summary: Nick Kyrgios came out on top in the latest 'Battle of the Sexes' exhibition match with a straight-sets victory over women's world No 1 Aryna Sabalenka in Dubai.

items.title: Anderson wins Ally Pally classic as Cross sets up Littler clash
items.summary: Gary Anderson edged out Jermaine Wattimena in a seven-set thriller at Alexandra Palace to reach the last 16 of the World Darts Championship.

items.title: Calvert-Lewin continues hot streak to earn Leeds point at Sunderland
items.summary: Dominic Calvert-Lewin‚Äôs startling metamorphosis from forgotten man to a striker on the verge of an England recall continued as his seventh goal in six games further reinforced Daniel Farke‚Äôs job security at Leeds. A month ago Farke was rumoured to be under severe pressure at Elland Road but a change of formation and, most importantly, Calvert-Lewin‚Äôs renaissance have gone a long way towards assuaging relegation fears. Continue reading...

items.title: Andy Carroll to appear in court after arrest and charge for breaching order
items.summary: Carroll charged with breaching non-molestation order Former England striker due in court on Tuesday The former England striker Andy Carroll has been charged with breaching a non-molestation order and is set to appear in court on Tuesday. Carroll, who was capped nine times by England and played for Newcastle and Liverpool, was arrested in April after allegedly committing an offence the previous month. Continue reading...

items.title: Liverpool set-piece problems a 'killer' - Van Dijk
items.summary: Virgil van Dijk says that Liverpool's problems from set-pieces "hurts" and that the second phase is a "killer" for them.
